description.raw:
There is a [flaky test failure of `UNIT_LogPlay_TEST`](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/GazeboDefault/job/gazebo-ci-default-homebrew-amd64/70/testReport/junit/(root)/LogPlay_TEST/Accessors/) caused by an uninitialized `initialIterations` variable (see valgrind output below):

~~~
==15526== Conditional jump or move depends on uninitialised value(s)
==15526==    at 0x414B2A: testing::AssertionResult testing::internal::CmpHelperEQ<unsigned long, unsigned int>(char const*, char const*, unsigned long const&, unsigned int const&) (gtest.h:1448)
==15526==    by 0x40E4BA: Compare<long unsigned int, unsigned int> (gtest.h:1485)
==15526==    by 0x40E4BA: LogPlay_TEST_Accessors_Test::TestBody() (LogPlay_TEST.cc:102)
==15526==    by 0x435C42: HandleSehExceptionsInMethodIfSupported<testing::Test, void> (gtest.cc:2079)
==15526==    by 0x435C42: void testing::internal::HandleExceptionsInMethodIfSupported<testing::Test, void>(testing::Test*, void (testing::Test::*)(), char const*) (gtest.cc:2115)
==15526==    by 0x4284A6: testing::Test::Run() (gtest.cc:2152)
==15526==    by 0x428545: testing::TestInfo::Run() (gtest.cc:2327)
==15526==    by 0x42864C: testing::TestCase::Run() (gtest.cc:2445)
==15526==    by 0x4288DC: testing::internal::UnitTestImpl::RunAllTests() (gtest.cc:4316)
==15526==    by 0x428BDD: HandleSehExceptionsInMethodIfSupported<testing::internal::UnitTestImpl, bool> (gtest.cc:2079)
==15526==    by 0x428BDD: HandleExceptionsInMethodIfSupported<testing::internal::UnitTestImpl, bool> (gtest.cc:2115)
==15526==    by 0x428BDD: testing::UnitTest::Run() (gtest.cc:3930)
==15526==    by 0x4076BE: RUN_ALL_TESTS (gtest.h:2288)
==15526==    by 0x4076BE: main (LogPlay_TEST.cc:464)
~~~

I've initialized a few others as well.
